snippet.title: Henosis: Official Launch Trailer EN
snippet.description:
After a year of further development, we are now in the final stages of release!

We’ve officially dropped the new launch trailer for our weird, little platform puzzler as well as a fresh demo (v1.2) which is now available to download on Itch.io for Windows, Mac and Linux OS with the first 4 levels included. 

We’re in the final stretch as we round off the last of the bug fixing, general tweaks and refinement along with extra play testing. It's been a long and challenging road but a very rewarding experience nonetheless.

The full game is slated for release on Steam July 24th.

Official site: https://henosisgame.com/

Gives us a like on our Facebook page:  https://www.facebook.com/oddcrittergames/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oddcrittergames/

Steam Store Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1355720/Henosis/

Download the latest demo (v1.2) from Itch.io: https://oddcritter.itch.io/henosis
